title: Electron moves in same direction as magnetic field

content.prompt: Suppose that the electron is moving straight down in the same direction as B when it enters the region of the magnetic field. What is the direction of the magnetic force, if any, on the electron when it first enters the field region?

choices.label: None; there is no magnetic force on the electron.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
